Body: Possible Duplicate:  Is there an app for android that will record sound coming from the speakers, like audacity does on the computer?  Is there a way to record sound output in android. Some sort of app or any facility. There are few sound recorders which record Microphone input; but I just want to record the output from phone. For things like a segment of a FM radio broadcast, or a Text-To-Speech etc.. while Im wearing headphones.
Title: Record Speaker-Out Sound (not microphone)

history.Text: Is there a way to record **sound output** in android. Some sort of app or any facility. There are few sound recorders which record Microphone **input**; but I just want to record the **output** from phone. For things like a segment of a FM radio broadcast, or a Text-To-Speech etc.. while Im wearing headphones.

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Is there an app for android that will record sound coming from the speakers, like audacity does on the computer?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/20230/is-there-an-app-for-android-that-will-record-sound-coming-from-the-speakers-lik)  Is there a way to record **sound output** in android. Some sort of app or any facility. There are few sound recorders which record Microphone **input**; but I just want to record the **output** from phone. For things like a segment of a FM radio broadcast, or a Text-To-Speech etc.. while Im wearing headphones.
